6256d43cb0590.Name: LLP012 List addresses to select from
6256d43cb0590.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59dc224eb4f63","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) as display
	   ,uprn as name
	   ,concat('showAd: ', {showAd}, ' postcode_search:', {postcode_search}) as checkForConditionValues
  FROM (SELECT sao
  			  ,pao
  			  ,street_name
  			  ,town_name
  			  ,uprn
          FROM llpgcache 
         WHERE length(REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))>5
           AND postcode != ''
           AND (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,' ',postcode) like concat('%',REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ','%'),'%'))) tmp
ORDER BY CAST(pao AS SIGNED),sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 300","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

6256e25cdaee2.Name: LLP013 Selected value to fields inc text area address
6256e25cdaee2.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59dc224eb4f63","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT a.*
		,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='1',flat_out
									 ,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='2',house_out
																  ,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='3',street_out
																							   ,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='4',town_out,'')))) as textOut1
		,if(substring(a.test,2,1)='2',house_out
									 ,if(substring(a.test,2,1)='3',street_out
																  ,if(substring(a.test,2,1)='4',town_out,''))) as textOut2
		,if(substring(a.test,3,1)='3',street_out
									 ,if(substring(a.test,3,1)='4',town_out,'')) as textOut3
		,if(substring(a.test,4,1)='4',town_out,'') as textOut4
		,a.test as available
		,concat(if(flat_out != '', concat(flat_out,', '), ''),
				if(house_out != '', concat(house_out,', '), ''),
				if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,', '), ''),
				if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,', '), ''),
				postcode_out5) as AddrConcat
		,concat(flat_out, if(length(flat_out) > 3, '\n', if(flat_out != '', ' ', '')), 
				house_out, if(length(house_out) > 3, '\n', if(house_out != '', ' ', '')), 
				if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,'\n'), ''),
				if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,'\n'), ''),
				postcode_out5) as AdTextArea_out
FROM (SELECT sao as flat_out,
			 pao as house_out,
			 street_name as street_out,
			 town_name as town_out, 
			 postcode as postcode_out5,
			 uprn as uprn_out,
			 lng as lng_out,
			 lat as lat_out,
			 {Choose_Address} as uprn_selected,
			 CONCAT(if(length(sao)>0,1,'')
					,if(length(pao)>0,2,'')
					,if(length(street_name)>0,3,'')
					,if(length(town_name)>0,4,'')) as test
	    FROM llpgcache
WHERE uprn = {Choose_Address}) a","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

663b7b4ab166a.Name: LLP037 - OS postcode lookup
663b7b4ab166a.Output_template:
{"method":"GET","url":"https://api.os.uk/search/places/v1/postcode?postcode={postcode_search_after_out}{OSsearchOverride}&key={OSapiKey}","enableURLHashing":"no","show_headers":"no","responseType":"JSON","strip_namespaces":"1","path_to_values":"TransResults/Address","fields":"","xslt_stylesheet":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform">
<xsl:template match="results">
  <xsl:variable name="msgA" select="../header/totalresults"/>
  <xsl:choose>
  <xsl:when test="$msgA = 1">
  <body>
	<TransResults>
		<Address>
			<name><xsl:value-of select="DPA/UPRN"/></name>
			<display><xsl:value-of select="DPA/ADDRESS"/></display>
		</Address>
	</TransResults>
  </body>
  </xsl:when>
  <xsl:otherwise>
  <xsl:for-each select="ArrayNode">
  <body>
	<TransResults>
		<Address>
			<name><xsl:value-of select="DPA/UPRN"/></name>
			<display><xsl:value-of select="DPA/ADDRESS"/></display>
		</Address>
	</TransResults>
  </body>
  </xsl:for-each>
  </xsl:otherwise>
  </xsl:choose>
</xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>","results_page_columns":"","secure_fields_db_http":""}

663cab3feddca.Name: LLP039 - OS selected address to fields
663cab3feddca.Output_template:
{"method":"GET","url":"https://api.os.uk/search/places/v1/uprn?uprn={Choose_AddressOS}&key={OSapiKey}","enableURLHashing":"no","show_headers":"no","responseType":"JSON","strip_namespaces":"1","path_to_values":"TransResults/Address","fields":"","xslt_stylesheet":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform">
<xsl:template match="results/DPA">
<xsl:variable name='newline'><xsl:text>
</xsl:text></xsl:variable>
<xsl:variable name='comma'><xsl:text>, </xsl:text></xsl:variable>
  <body>
	<TransResults>
		<Address>
			<flat_out><xsl:value-of select="SUB_BUILDING_NAME"/></flat_out>
			<house_out>
				<xsl:choose>
					<xsl:when test="string-length('BUILDING_NUMBER') = 0 or string-length('BUILDING_NAME') = 0">
						<xsl:value-of select="BUILDING_NUMBER"/><xsl:value-of select="BUILDING_NAME"/>
					</xsl:when>
					<xsl:otherwise>
						<xsl:value-of select="concat(BUILDING_NUMBER,$comma,BUILDING_NAME)"/>
					</xsl:otherwise>
				</xsl:choose>
			</house_out>
			<street_out><xsl:value-of select="THOROUGHFARE_NAME"/></street_out>
			<town_out><xsl:value-of select="POST_TOWN"/></town_out>
			<postcode_out5><xsl:value-of select="POSTCODE"/></postcode_out5>
			<uprn_out><xsl:value-of select="UPRN"/></uprn_out>
			<lat_out></lat_out>
			<lng_out></lng_out>
			<uprn_selected><xsl:value-of select="UPRN"/></uprn_selected>
			<test>234</test>
			<xsl:choose>
				<xsl:when test="string-length(ORGANISATION_NAME) = 0">
				<xsl:choose>
					<xsl:when test="string-length(SUB_BUILDING_NAME) = 0">
					<xsl:choose>
						<xsl:when test="string-length(BUILDING_NUMBER) = 0">
						<xsl:choose>
							<xsl:when test="string-length(BUILDING_NAME) = 0">
								<textOut1><xsl:value-of select="THOROUGHFARE_NAME"/></textOut1>
								<textOut2><xsl:value-of select="POST_TOWN"/></textOut2>
								<textOut3></textOut3>
								<textOut4></textOut4>
								<available>234</available>
								<AdTextArea_out><xsl:value-of select="concat(THOROUGHFARE_NAME,$newline,POST_TOWN,$newline,POSTCODE)"/></AdTextArea_out>
							</xsl:when>
							<xsl:when test="string-length(BUILDING_NAME) < 4">
								<textOut1><xsl:value-of select="concat(BUILDING_NAME,$comma,THOROUGHFARE_NAME)"/></textOut1>
								<textOut2><xsl:value-of select="POST_TOWN"/></textOut2>
								<textOut3></textOut3>
								<textOut4></textOut4>
								<available>234</available>
								<AdTextArea_out><xsl:value-of select="concat(BUILDING_NAME,$comma,THOROUGHFARE_NAME,$newline,POST_TOWN,$newline,POSTCODE)"/></AdTextArea_out>
							</xsl:when>
							<xsl:otherwise>
								<textOut1><xsl:value-of select="BUILDING_NAME"/></textOut1>
								<textOut2><xsl:value-of select="THOROUGHFARE_NAME"/></textOut2>
								<textOut3><xsl:value-of select="POST_TOWN"/></textOut3>
								<textOut4></textOut4>
								<available>234</available>
								<AdTextArea_out><xsl:value-of select="concat(BUILDING_NAME,$newline,THOROUGHFARE_NAME,$newline,POST_TOWN,$newline,POSTCODE)"/></AdTextArea_out>
							</xsl:otherwise>
						</xsl:choose>
						</xsl:when>
						<xsl:when test="string-length(BUILDING_NUMBER) < 4">
						<xsl:choose>
							<xsl:when test="string-length(BUILDING_NAME) = 0">
								<textOut1><xsl:value-of select="concat(BUILDING_NUMBER,$comma,THOROUGHFARE_NAME)"/></textOut1>
								<textOut2><xsl:value-of select="POST_TOWN"/></textOut2>

							<xsl:when test="string-length(BUILDING_NAME) = 0">

							</xsl:when>

							</xsl:when>

								<textOut3><xsl:value-of select="THOROUGHFARE_NAME"/></textOut3>
								<textOut4><xsl:value-of select="POST_TOWN"/></textOut4>
								<available>234</available>
								<AdTextArea_out><xsl:value-of select="concat(ORGANISATION_NAME,$newline,BUILDING_NUMBER,$newline,SUB_BUILDING_NAME,$newline,THOROUGHFARE_NAME,$newline,POST_TOWN,$newline,POSTCODE)"/></AdTextArea_out>
							</xsl:when>
							<xsl:otherwise>
								<textOut1><xsl:value-of select="ORGANISATION_NAME"/></textOut1>
								<textOut2><xsl:value-of select="concat(BUILDING_NUMBER,$comma,SUB_BUILDING_NAME,$comma,BUILDING_NAME)"/></textOut2>
								<textOut3><xsl:value-of select="THOROUGHFARE_NAME"/></textOut3>
								<textOut4><xsl:value-of select="POST_TOWN"/></textOut4>
								<available>234</available>
								<AdTextArea_out><xsl:value-of select="concat(ORGANISATION_NAME,$newline,BUILDING_NUMBER,$newline,SUB_BUILDING_NAME,$comma,BUILDING_NAME,$newline,THOROUGHFARE_NAME,$newline,POST_TOWN,$newline,POSTCODE)"/></AdTextArea_out>
							</xsl:otherwise>
						</xsl:choose>
						</xsl:otherwise>
					</xsl:choose>
					</xsl:otherwise>
				</xsl:choose>
				</xsl:otherwise>
			</xsl:choose>
			<AddrConcat><xsl:value-of select="ADDRESS"/></AddrConcat>
		</Address>
	</TransResults>
  </body>
</xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>","results_page_columns":"","secure_fields_db_http":""}

6256e9029d71c.Name: LLP023 Confirm the entered address inc text area address
6256e9029d71c.Output_template: {"systemID":"59dc224eb4f63","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"select a.*, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 - b.p5 > 2,'Entered','') as uprn_selected, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 - b.p5 > 2,'',1) as Address_Found, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 - b.p5 > 2,'' ,concat(if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 < 3,'The address must contain a flat or house number, road and postcode. ','') ,if(b.p4 = 1,' The postcode must contain a space, for e.g. "PO1 2AL"','') ,if(b.p5 = 1,' The postcode must be in Portsmouth and contain a space, for e.g. "PO1 2AL"',''))) as confMsg, '' as confirmAddress, b.* from( select aq.* ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='1',flat_out ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='2',house_out ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='3',street_out ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='4',town_out,' ')))) as textOut1 ,if(substring(aq.test,2,1)='2',house_out ,if(substring(aq.test,2,1)='3',street_out ,if(substring(aq.test,2,1)='4',town_out,' '))) as textOut2 ,if(substring(aq.test,3,1)='3',street_out ,if(substring(aq.test,3,1)='4',town_out,' ')) as textOut3 ,if(substring(aq.test,4,1)='4',town_out,' ') as textOut4 ,aq.test as available ,concat(if(flat_out != '', concat(flat_out,', '), ' '), if(house_out != '', concat(house_out,', '), ' '), if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,', '), ' '), if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,', '), ' '), postcode_out5, zIPPostcode, if(country_out != '', concat(', ', country_out), ' ')) as AddrConcat ,concat(flat_out, if(length(flat_out) > 3, '\n', ' '), house_out, if(length(house_out) > 3, '\n', ' '), if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,'\n'), ' '), if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,'\n'), ' '), postcode_out5, zIPPostcode, if(country_out != '', concat('\n', country_out), ' ')) as AdTextArea_out ,concat(flat_out, if(length(flat_out) > 3, '\n', ' '), house_out, if(length(house_out) > 3, '\n', ' '), if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,'\n'), ' '), if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,'\n'), ' '), postcode_out5, zIPPostcode, if(country_out != '', concat('\n', country_out), ' ')) as AdTextArea_de1 from ( select 123 as id, {flat_out1} as flat_out, {house_out1} as house_out, {street_out1} as street_out, {town_out1} as town_out, if({postcode_out51} != '', {postcode_out51}, {postcode_out52}) as postcode_out5, {zIPPostcode1} as zIPPostcode, {country_out1} as country_out, {sel_country} as country_id_out, '' as uprn_out, '' as lng_out, '' as lat_out, '' as existSelected, '' as existingCustomer, CONCAT(if(length({flat_out1})>0,1,'') ,if(length({house_out1})>0,2,'') ,if(length({street_out1})>0,3,'') ,if(length({town_out1})>0,4,'')) as test) aq ) as a RIGHT JOIN (select if(c.p1 + c.p2 + c.p3 - c.p4 - c.p5 > 2,'123','321') as id, c.* from (select if({flat_out1} != '' or {house_out1} != '',1,0) as p1, if({street_out1} != '',1,0) as p2, if({postcode_out52} != '' or {postcode_out51} != '' or {zIPPostcode1} != '',1,0) as p3, if({postcode_out51} REGEXP '(((^[BEGLMNSbeglmns][1-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww][2-9])|(^([Aa][BLbl]|[Bb][ABDHLNRSTabnhlnrst]|[Cc][ABFHMORTVWabfhmortvw]|[Dd][ADEGHLNTYadeghlnty]|[Ee][HNXhnx]|[Ff][KYky]|[Gg][LUYluy]|[Hh][ADGPRSUXadgprsux]|[Ii][GMPVgmpv]|[JEje]|[Kk][ATWYatwy]|[Ll][ADELNSUadelnsu]|[Mm][EKLekl]|[Nn][EGNPRWegnprw]|O[LXlx]|[Pp][AEHLORaehlor]|[Rr][GHMghm]|[Ss][AEGKL-Paegkl-pRSTWYrstwy]|[Tt][ADFNQRSWadfnqrsw]|[Uu][Bb]|[Ww][ADFNRSVadfnrsv]|[Yy][Oo]|[Zz][Ee])[0-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww]1[A-Ha-hJKSTUWjkstuw0-9])|(((^[Ww][Cc][1-2])|(^[Ee][Cc][1-4])|(^[Ss][Ww]1))[ABEHMNPRVWXYabehmnprvwxy]))[_ ]([0-9][ABD-Habd-hJLNP-Ujlnp-uW-Zw-z]{2}))$|(^[Gg][Ii][Rr][_ ]0[Aa]{2})$',0,if({postcode_out51} != '',1,0)) as p4, if({postcode_out52} REGEXP '^(([Pp][Oo])[1-6][_ ]([0-9][ABD-Habd-hJLNP-Ujlnp-uW-Zw-z]{2}))|(([Pp][Oo])[7][_ ][5](([Aa][TUXYZtuxyz])|([Bb][ASTUastu])))$',0,if({postcode_out52} != '',1,0)) as p5) as c) as b ON a.id = b.id","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

651bf7c2e5f39.Name: LLP032 - Confirm the entered text address

props.label: html 4
props.content:
{#testFormWarn}

Purpose

To ensure that PCC tenancies are correctly recorded as either General Needs or Sheltered Housing Units.

Status changes occur either at the start of a tenancy or during the duration of a tenancy ( ie from general needs to category 1 or vica versa)

Start of a tenancy - the responsibility is with the housing officer.

During the tenancy -the responsibility is with the Sheltered Housing Management team.

Sheltered Housing accommodation will have:

  • an appropriate category recorded on Northgate
    • Shelt CAT 0.5 = Future lettings recorded as general needs
    • Shelt Cat 0 = Future lettings recorded as Sheltered
  • additional charges ie sheltered housing service charge and supporting people charge
  • an alarm unit within the flat linked into the scheme and/or Southampton telecare
  • records held on the telecare system shared with Southampton
  • the support of a scheme manager
  • These changes relate to Category 1 Sheltered Housing. So Category 2 and Category 2.5 properties always remain as Sheltered Units

props.label: html 2
props.content:
Action to take

Repairs Support Team

Please raise for the Warden Call contractor to disable the alarm system.

Alarm Receiving Centre

Please archive the customer record and label inactive.

Debit Control

Please end SPCHARGE, SERVCHARGE via bulk elem on the above days.
If currently SHELTCAT code 0.5 then remove the coding using the end date and delete TARGET-CAT.
If Shelt Cat 1 change to Shelt Cat 0.
